about_the_game:
Holmes was on vacation, and everything seemed as calm as a holiday in Brazil should be. But now, he’s gone without a trace. To uncover Sherlock’s whereabouts, you’ll need to help the adorable detective cat, Sherlocat, in this investigative adventure.

SherloCAT Holmes combines Picross with an engaging narrative. Picross, also known as hanjie or nonogram, is a popular puzzle worldwide that tests your problem-solving skills. You’re presented with a grid of squares that can either be filled or left blank. Your goal is to fill the blank squares according to the clues provided to reveal a hidden image. New to this type of game? Don’t worry! The game features various difficulty levels, offering an enjoyable experience for everyone and helping you become a Picross champion! Choose your experience! There are two game modes. The classic mode is for those who want a cozy experience—relaxing and pressure-free. The challenge mode, on the other hand, comes with a timer, error limits, and everything you need to give your brain a real workout.

Use all your skill and intelligence to solve nonograms, unraveling each puzzle that leads to intriguing clues about Sherlock Holmes' whereabouts. The fate of the world’s most famous detective is in your hands!

Game Features:

  • Two game modes: classic mode for a relaxed experience and challenge mode for 🤯

  • A mix of mechanics (classic Picross and investigative story)

  • Level size: from 5x5 to 25x25, meaning 120 levels with varying difficulty—perfect for beginners and for seasoned nonogram masters

  • Relaxing music

  • Hints to avoid getting too stuck (if you want them!)

  • Clean and beautiful design

Choose between a super relaxing experience in classic mode or push your logical thinking and focus to the max in challenge mode! The visuals and soundtrack will make you forget all your worries and have a lot of fun!
